title: FS Jake Pfiester (Seated) Polar Bear PSA 3
author: Santo10Fan

posts.post_title: FS Jake Pfiester (Seated) Polar Bear PSA 3
posts.post_content:
Pfiester was a 2X World Series champion with the Cubs. Classic polar bear card with tobacco residue all over it. Front surface registry is good and the colors have not faded. Small velcro strip on back of holder. Includes USPS Priority, prices net to me PP/PPFF/Venmo

$70
